# FileMetaData.GetFileSize method

File Size in a desired Unit.

```csharp
public double GetFileSize(FileSizeUnit fileSizeUnit = FileSizeUnit.Byte)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| fileSizeUnit | The Unit for File Size calculation. Default: Byte |
